Description: On I-77 North in the County of Bland, at Big Walker Mountain Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On VA-36 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of University Ave, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 3.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder, left lane, and left center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 68.5 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
